verses.name: Ezekiel 16:16
verses.text: And of thy garments thou didst take, and deckedst thy high places with divers colours, and playedst the harlot thereupon: the like things shall not come, neither shall it be so.

verses.name: Ezekiel 16:17
verses.text: Thou hast also taken thy fair jewels of my gold and of my silver, which I had given thee, and madest to thyself images of men, and didst commit whoredom with them,

verses.name: Ezekiel 16:18
verses.text: And tookest thy broidered garments, and coveredst them: and thou hast set mine oil and mine incense before them.
